author: Special Correspondent
text:
D. John (43) of Sellur was stabbed to death near the LIC office at Sellur on Wednesday evening.

The police said the deceased, an employee of a private finance company, was waylaid by two persons, riding on a motorbike. Within a flash, they stabbed him on his abdomen and neck at around 6 p.m. After the victim collapsed on the road, the duo took to heels abandoning their motorbike.

The man was rushed to the Government Rajaji Hospital where he was declared dead.

The Sellur police are investigating.

Man hacked

Meanwhile, in another incident, M. Prakash (29) of Ponnagaram, a driver, was hacked by two persons at Kanagavel Colony under Thilagarthidal police station limits in the early hours of Wednesday.

The police said that Prakash had made some comments on the wife of K. Kanagaraj of Kanagavel Colony. Angered by this, Kanagaraj and his nephew inflicted serious injuries on his head and face at around 5.30 a.m. Kanagaraj surrendered before a court in Melur. The Thilagarthidal police are investigating.
title: Man murdered at Sellur
